info.name: Basal forebrain
info.description: The basal forebrain is the general area of the forebrain near the inferior surface of the telencephalon between the orbital gyri and the hypothalamus. It includes the substantia innominata area, septal area, anterior perforated substance, etc.
info.item: /Sections/Thin, Whole Brain/Sagittal & Parasagittal/5 Sag Thin Sec
